root.name: Death and the Fly
root.description: GameplayYou play in this game either Death or The Fly. Using their own unique abilities you have to lead them through levels with traps and puzzles. Combining their skills is a must to survive.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP, Vista, Win7Processor: Pentium 4, 2.6 GHzMemory: 768 MB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 1.3 Compatible with 128 MB RAMHard Drive: 360 MB Space FreeSound: OpenAl compatible
